resources.string:
"1. Enter a width and height in the text box, whole number only decimal numbers are not accepted.
2. After enter the width and height, press enter then a kitten picture that match the width and height that the user entered will show up on the screen.
3. Press the save button will save the last width and height that the user entered.
4. Click on one of the Kitten picture will show you a message of the selected picture's width and height. "
Do you want to save the text that you entered?
You have save the text successfully!
